title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practice Competencies: MEIoT-Based Integrated 2D Coordinate System Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe coordinate axes, quadrants, and point positions using the MEIoT 2D-CACSET tool
Learners can complete a project mapping IoT sensor data to a coordinate system at the virtual-concrete representation level
Learners can perform tasks visualizing real-world data collected via a smartphone-based IoT platform on a 2D coordinate system

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
